title: Zero Assumptions: no growth, no inflation, flat withdrawals
description: Pure arithmetic: validates pipeline and charts.
objective: Understand basic withdrawal mechanics without complexity

title: Fixed Return: 4% nominal, flat withdrawals
description: Adds deterministic growth to check compounding.
objective: See how consistent returns affect portfolio longevity
expected_outcome: Portfolio grows initially, then declines based on withdrawal rate

title: Fees Drag: 0.2% vs 1.0% annual fees
description: Compare identical portfolios with different fee structures.
objective: Quantify the impact of investment fees over time
expected_outcome: Higher fees significantly reduce portfolio longevity

title: Inflation-Indexed Withdrawals (CPI 3%)
description: Introduces CPI and real vs. nominal views.
expected_outcome: Nominal withdrawals increase yearly to maintain real spending power

title: Sequence of Returns: early bear, then recovery
description: Highlights path dependence and ruin risk.
objective: Demonstrate why timing of returns matters for withdrawals
expected_outcome: Early losses cause higher ruin probability than late losses

title: Volatility Impact: same average, different variance
description: Compare smooth vs volatile returns with identical averages.
objective: Show how volatility affects withdrawal sustainability
expected_outcome: Higher volatility increases ruin risk despite same average return

title: Guardrails (Guyton-Klinger)
expected_outcome: Portfolio lasts longer with dynamic spending adjustments

title: Glidepath: Reducing Equity Over Time
description: Shift from aggressive to conservative allocation with age.
objective: Balance growth potential with stability as retirement progresses
expected_outcome: Reduced volatility in later years at cost of some growth
